Screen time: New limits needed in New Zealand schools, experts say https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/screen-time-new-limits-needed-in-new-zealand-schools-experts-say/CLU4QMG3WNHPLEN4XI6IZNTUPU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/screen-time-new-limits-needed-in-new-zealand-schools-experts-say/CLU4QMG3WNHPLEN4XI6IZNTUPU/ Isaac DavisonThe risks existed whether a child was doing homework or watching TikTok. Thu, 04 Jul 2024 12:01:00 +0000 The recommendations said 2 to 5-year-olds should have "minimal" screen time in sessions of no more than 10 to 15 minutes. Photo / Getty Images
Covid 19: anti-vax Hawke’s Bay doctor found guilty after switching registration to unsanctioned ‘tikanga’ council https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/covid-19-anti-vax-hawkes-bay-doctor-found-guilty-after-switching-registration-to-unsanctioned-tikanga-council/M5S2LVGDOFERRIW4FVBDSFCNUM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/covid-19-anti-vax-hawkes-bay-doctor-found-guilty-after-switching-registration-to-unsanctioned-tikanga-council/M5S2LVGDOFERRIW4FVBDSFCNUM/ Ric StevensA pharmacy contacted the Medical Council after receiving prescriptions from the doctor. Thu, 04 Jul 2024 08:29:00 +0000 The doctor was unwilling to get vaccinated as required by his Medical Council registration. Photo / 123RF

Motorcyclist killed in two-vehicle crash on West Coast, SH6 closed as Serious Crash Unit responds https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/motorcyclist-killed-in-two-vehicle-crash-on-west-coast-sh6-close-as-serious-crash-unit-responds/IDRRMNWUFNCCLAN6YOCKLFMEA4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/motorcyclist-killed-in-two-vehicle-crash-on-west-coast-sh6-close-as-serious-crash-unit-responds/IDRRMNWUFNCCLAN6YOCKLFMEA4/ “Despite the best efforts of emergency services, the person died at the scene.” Thu, 04 Jul 2024 07:15:40 +0000 Emergency services rushed to the scene on State Highway 6, Main South Rd, in Paroa just before 4pm on Thursday after the collision between a motorcycle and vehicle.
Flight Check: Hainan Airlines, New Zealand to Chinahttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/flight-check-hainan-airlines-new-zealand-to-china/RGLFWA4BWFBB3A3MC46YBQQFHA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/flight-check-hainan-airlines-new-zealand-to-china/RGLFWA4BWFBB3A3MC46YBQQFHA/ Jaime LythWhat it's like to fly to China with Hainan Airlines.Thu, 04 Jul 2024 07:00:00 +0000 A Hainan Airlines Airbus A330.

Auckland Council votes against higher road speed limits, in opposition to Govt’s plan https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-council-votes-against-higher-road-speed-limits-oppositing-governments-plan/VVRYMZHUDFCHZAQQM3FY7W34OQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-council-votes-against-higher-road-speed-limits-oppositing-governments-plan/VVRYMZHUDFCHZAQQM3FY7W34OQ/ Simon WilsonAuckland Council will oppose the Government plan to raise speed limits, but can't stop it. Tesla crash: Tradie crashes through Auckland man’s garage, $80k Tesla damaged https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tesla-crash-tradie-crashes-through-auckland-mans-garage-80k-tesla-damaging/BPHWD3DPSFAB7N5R2NK2HWFRFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tesla-crash-tradie-crashes-through-auckland-mans-garage-80k-tesla-damaging/BPHWD3DPSFAB7N5R2NK2HWFRFE/ Raphael FranksRob Johnson caught the crash on camera. It shows the work van careening into his home. Thu, 04 Jul 2024 05:22:29 +0000 Video footage of the crash showed it came out of nowhere. A tradesman appeared to be using Johnson’s driveway to make a three-point turn. Photo / Rob Johnson
